articles.title: European markets mixed as economic concerns dominate Davos - CNBC
articles.description: European markets were muted on Tuesday, with concerns about the direction of the global economy high on the agenda at the World Economic Forum.
articles.content: 2023 will be "the year of inflection" for the global economy, said UBS CEO Ralph Hamers on the sidelines of the World Economic Forum in Davos, Switzerland, where inflation, interest rates and economi… [+682 chars]

articles.title: SA teams to play in Europe if they earn 'home' Champions Cup semis - News24
articles.description: South African clubs will have to 'host' any potential Champions Cup semi-finals in Europe and not in South Africa, competition organiser EPCR told AFP on Monday.
articles.content:
